keyMoments.title: Thousand Sunny Officially Named
keyMoments.description: The crew officially names their new ship the Thousand Sunny before departing Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of a new era for the crew with their advanced ship.

keyMoments.title: Post-Enies Lobby Bounties Revealed
keyMoments.description: All crew members receive updated or first-time bounty posters following their assault on Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew as a major threat to the World Government with a combined bounty over 600 million berries.

ships.description: The crew's second ship, designed and built by Franky using wood from the Treasure Tree Adam. Features advanced technology including Coup de Burst.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

members.joinCircumstances: Leader and founder of the Revolutionary Army.
Works as an intelligence controller at the Revolutionary Army headquarters.

keyMoments.title: Revolutionary Army Headquarters Shown
keyMoments.description: The Revolutionary Army's base at Baltigo is revealed, with Dragon and Terry Gilteo reviewing bounty posters.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Revolutionary Army's operations and their interest in the Straw Hats' activities.

bases.description: Secret headquarters of the Revolutionary Army
